annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Regulation 26(2)

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) In regulation 4(3D)(b), for "regulation 3B of the Health Protection (Coronavirus, International Travel) (England) Regulations 2020" substitute "regulation 6 of the Health Protection (Coronavirus, International Travel and Operator Liability) (England) Regulations 2021".
annotations.translation: (2) 在第 4(3D)(b) 条中，将“2020 年健康保护（冠状病毒、国际旅行）（英格兰）条例第 3B 条”替换为“2021 年健康保护（冠状病毒、国际旅行和运营商责任）（英格兰）条例第 6 条”。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Regulation 19 (7)(b) to (d)

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 15. Breach of requirement under regulation 16(1), 17(1) or 18 (1) (other operator offences), £2,000.

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Regulation 19 (13)

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 16. Breach of requirement under regulation 15 (operator records and information), £500.
annotations.translation: 16. 违反第15条（操作员记录和信息）的要求，£500。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Regulation 19 (14)

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 17. Breach of regulation 19 (14) (wilful obstruction of a person carrying out a function under these Regulations)
annotations.translation: 17. 违反第19 (14)条（故意阻挠根据本条例执行职务的人）的行为

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 18. In determining how many fixed penalty notices a person ("P") has received for the purposes of paragraph 8 (breach of requirement in regulation 9 to self-isolate etc), if P received more than one fixed penalty notice for that offence before 2nd October 2020, only one of those notices may be taken into account.
annotations.translation: 18. 在确定某人（“原告”）就第8段（违反第9条的自我隔离等规定）收到多少份定额罚款通知书时，如原告人在2020年10月2日前收到多于一份定额罚款通知书，则只可考虑其中一份通知书。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: SCHEDULE 15
annotations.translation: 附表15

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Consequential Amendments
annotations.translation: 相应的修改

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. (1) The Health Protection (Notification) Regulations 2010 (a) are amended as follows.
annotations.translation: 1. (1) 《2010年健康保护（通知）条例》 (a) 修订如下。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (a) S.I. 2010/659. Regulations 4 (3D) and 4ZA were inserted by S.I. 2021/150. There are other amendments but none is relevant.
annotations.translation: (a) S.I. 2010/659.  S.I. 2021/150插入了第4 (3D)和4ZA条。 还有其他修正案，但都不相关。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) obstruction of a function relating to regulation 3
annotations.translation: (a) 妨碍与第3条有关的职能

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) in the case of the first fixed penalty notice, £500,
annotations.translation: (i) 对于第一个固定罚款通知，£500，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) in the case of the second fixed penalty notice, £1,000,
annotations.translation: (ii) 对于第二份固定罚款通知，£1,000 ，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) in the case of the third fixed penalty notice, £2,000,
annotations.translation: (iii) 如属第三份定额罚款通知，£2,000

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iv) in the case of the fourth and subsequent fixed penalty notices, £4,000,
annotations.translation: (iv) 如属第四份及其后固定罚款通知，£4,000，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: with no account taken of any fixed penalty notices given before 4.00 a.m. on 18th January 2021;
annotations.translation: 未考虑2021年1月18日凌晨4时前发出的定额罚款通知书；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) obstruction of a function relating to regulation 4—
annotations.translation: (b) 妨碍与规例第4条有关的职能-

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) in the case of the first fixed penalty notice, £500,
annotations.translation: (i) 如属第一份固定罚款通知书，£500、

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) in the case of the second fixed penalty notice, £1,000,
annotations.translation: (ii) 对于第二份固定罚款通知，£1,000，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) in the case of the third fixed penalty notice, £2,000,
annotations.translation: (iii) 如属第三份定额罚款通知，£2,000

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iv) in the case of the fourth and subsequent fixed penalty notices, £4,000;
annotations.translation: (iv) 如属第四份及随后各份定额罚款通知，£4,000；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) obstruction of a function relating to regulations 9 or 11 apart from regulation 11(3), £1,000;
annotations.translation: (c) 妨碍与第 9 或 11 条第 11(3)条除外有关的职能，£1,000；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) obstruction of a function relating to regulation (11)(3) or in relation to regulation 10
annotations.translation: (d) 妨碍与第(11)(3)条或10条有关的职能

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) in the case of the first fixed penalty notice, £5,000,
annotations.translation: (i) 就第一份定额罚款通知而言，£5,000

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) in the case of the second fixed penalty notice, £8,000,
annotations.translation: (ii) 如果是第二次定额罚款通知，£8,000，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) in the case of the third and subsequent fixed penalty notice, £10,000;
annotations.translation: (iii) 如果是第三次及之后的定额罚款通知，£10,000；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (e) in any other case, £500.
annotations.translation: (e) 在任何其他情况下， £500。
